headline: Ventas (VTR) Profit Margins Turn Positive, Challenging Bearish Narratives on Growth Outlook
summary: Ventas (VTR) has swung to profitability, with earnings now forecast to grow by 24.24% annually and revenue expected to rise 11.1% each year over the next three years, both topping broader US market averages. This turnaround follows a challenging five-year stretch where earnings declined 21.8% per year and a recent one-off $75 million loss weighed on results, but the company’s net profit margin is now positive. While key risks remain, including less sustainable dividends and the impact of...

headline: Ventas Inc (VTR) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Growth in Senior Housing and Improved ...
summary: Ventas Inc (VTR) reports a 10% increase in normalized FFO per share and raises 2025 guidance amid robust performance in its senior housing portfolio.
